result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ga: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.orig: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht

result.ponchtml: Go deiṁin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíoḋ go fóill go háiriṫe na cinn faoi ḟoirgneaṁ a seaċtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
